name: fantastic
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: fantastic
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

example.eg: You look fantastic in that dress.
example.egtrans: 你穿着那件连衣裙看起来棒极了。

example.eg: They won the tournament? How fantastic!
example.egtrans: 他们赢了锦标赛？太棒了！

dsense.name: fantastic
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: strange and imaginary, or not reasonable
trans_examp.trans_cn: 幻想的；怪诞的，荒诞不经的

example.eg: He drew fantastic animals with two heads and large wings.
example.egtrans: 他画了一些长着两个头和巨大翅膀的怪兽。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 非同寻常的；奇怪的；难以置信的

example.eg: It seemed fantastic that they still remembered her 50 years later.
example.egtrans: 50年过去了，他们依然记得她，这似乎令人难以置信。

dsense.name: fantastic
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: A fantastic amount is very large.

example.eg: She must be earning a fantastic amount of money.
